home.no-search-results: There are no properties that match your search. Try changing the search filters or
home.no-properties: We are sorry. There are no properties available.

sign-up.bio-sample-text: Tell us a little about yourself...
sign-up.login-message: Already have an account? Log in
sign-up.repeated-email-error: An user already exists with that email
sign-up.birth-date-error: You must be between 13 and 105 years of age to use the platform
sign-up.phone-number: Please enter a valid phone number

notifications.newProposalSubject: There's a new proposal for your Property!

deleted.subject: A proposal for "{{propertyName}}" has been deleted.
deleted.text: Unfortunately, the creator of the proposal has cancelled it.

sent.subject: A proposal for "{{propertyName}}" has been sent
sent.text: All members of a proposal have accepted, so it has been sent to the property's owner

hostProposal.subject: There is a new proposal for your property, "{{propertyName}}"
hostProposal.text: You can see the members and as accept or decline it.

declined.subject: A proposal for "{{propertyName}}" has been cancelled.
declined.text: Unfortunately, a member of the proposal has declined and it has therefore been cancelled.

invitation.subject: You have been invited to a proposal for "{{propertyName}}"
invitation.text: You can view the proposal with all of its members and accept or decline it.

accepted.subject: A proposal you are in for "{{propertyName}}" has been accepted
accepted.text: The owner of the property has accepted your offer.

search-filters.error-capacity: Error, please indicate a number greater to zero
search-filters.error-budget: Error, please indicate a number greater or equal to zero

proposals-table.creator: Creator
proposals-table.no-proposals-guest: You are not participating in any proposals.

interests-table.no-interests: You are not interested in any properties.
interests-table.find-a-property: Find a property that suits you and show your interest!

proposal.declined: The owner of the property has declined the offer, this proposal is no longer active.
proposal.dropped: This proposal has been dropped by its creator and it is no longer active.
proposal.find-another-property: Find another property and make a new proposal!
proposal.canceled: One or more users have declined the proposal and it is no longer active.
proposal.accepted-host: You have accepted the offer, now you can contact the guests! The property has now become inactive.
proposal.accepted: The host has accepted the offer! Now you can contact the other students and the host.
proposal.sent: An offer has been sent to the host, you will receive a notification when they reply!
proposal.rented-host: This property is currently inactive. In order to answer the proposal please make it active.
proposal.your-property: This is your property. You can either accept or decline the offer:
proposal.already-replied: You have already replied to this proposal.

create-property.upload-up-to-4-pictures: Upload up to 4 pictures of the property:
create-property.name: Name

error-msg.notEnoughPictures: Please upload at least 1 picture of the property
error-msg.tooManyPictures: You may only upload up to 4 pictures of the property
error-msg.name: Please write a name with 50 characters or less
error-msg.description: Please write a description in 700 characters or less
error-msg.privacy: Please select a level of privacy
error-msg.capacity: Please select a value between 1 and 100
error-msg.rent: Rent per month must be at least $1

detailed-property.property-is-inactive: This property is inactive, you cannot create proposals or show interest in it.
detailed-property.must-be-logged-in: You must be logged in to show interest.
detailed-property.empty-rules: This property has no special rules
detailed-property.empty-services: This property has no special services

create-proposal-modal.other-students: other students to create a proposal to rent this property and split the rent.
create-proposal-modal.warning-limit: If you create a proposal without selecting anyone, the offer will be sent directly to the host and you will be paying full rent.
create-proposal-modal.other-students-selected-max: other students. This is the maximum capacity for this property and you won't be able to select more students. If you want to change the selected options, please unselect one of them first.
create-proposal-modal.no-other-students-are-interested: No other users have shown interest in this property!

error.500-subtitle: We're sorry, we have detected an error in the website. Our staff has been notified and will repair it.
error.500-subtitle2: We invite you to contact us at
error.500-subtitle3: and we'll get back at you when we fix this issue. Thank you!
error.404-subtitle: We couldn't find the page you were looking for :( click
error.404-subtitle2: to get back to the homepage.
error.403-subtitle: Sorry, you are not allowed in here.
